price: 42. Nor is it the word of a soothsayer (or a foreteller): little is that you remember!
arabic: وَلَا بِقَوۡلِ كَاهِنٖۚ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: walā biqawli kāhinin qalīlan mā tadhakkarūna
